notices.name: Pre-Bid Conference
notices.data: Pre-bid conference scheduled on March 28th, 2024 at 2:00 PM to discuss project specifications.

notices.name: Bid Cancellation Notice
notices.data: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the bid for Construction of New Office Building has been canceled.

notices.name: Bid Opening Announcement
notices.data: Bid opening scheduled on April 30th, 2024 at 9:30 AM. All interested parties invited to attend.
